about_the_game:
*You can purchase this item ingame for 500,000 gold but purchasing this DLC will unlock it from the start of the game

Diamond Gold Collector:
The diamond gold collector will automatically pickup gold that is dropped at very fast intervals to save you having to scroll over the gold when it's dropped, it's great for idle players

*The diamond collector moves at a much slower pace than the bronze or silver collector and spawns a lot more frequently thus collecting a lot of gold

*Stacks with the Bronze Gold Collector and the SilverGold Collector so you can have up to 3 gold collectors running at once
